text:
Hello Everyone:wave:, we are migrating a blog from Wordpress to HubSpot but we are not sure of what to do with the Wordpress blog, should we just unpublish it or should we delete it? We ask this because we want to avoid having duplicate content.
Thank you
Hey Estefanía, will the url structure be changing at all in the blog?

for example if your old WP blog is `<http://blog.domain.com|blog.domain.com>` and your new blog is `<http://domain.com/blog|domain.com/blog>` then you want to make sure to create proper 301 domain redirects for the posts located at `<http://blog.domain.com|blog.domain.com>` to point to the new home at `<http://doman.com/blog|doman.com/blog>`
Great! That helps me a lot to understand better. Thank you <@U2H3TT8F2>
